akn:section.akn:heading: Eligibility of student borrowers and terms of federally insured student loans

akn:content.akn:p: (a) List of requirements Except as provided in section 1078–3 of this title, a loan by an eligible lender shall be insurable by the Secretary under the provisions of this part only if—
(b) Special rules for multiple disbursement For the purpose of subsection (a)(4)—

(c) Special repayment rules Except as provided in subsection (a)(2)(H), the total of the payments by a borrower during any year of any repayment period with respect to the aggregate amount of all loans to that borrower which are insured under this part shall not, unless the borrower and the lender otherwise agree, be less than $600 or the balance of all such loans (together with interest thereon), whichever amount is less (but in no instance less than the amount of interest due and payable).
(d) Borrower information The lender shall obtain the borrower’s driver’s license number, if any, at the time of application for the loan.
